turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I would like to order a pizza I heard Pizza Hut has a deal for large pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Certainly I can do that for you, what kind of pizza would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a large two topping pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pepperoni sounds good and sausage?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sorry sir I just saw they have no more sausage would you like black olives instead?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I don't think so do they have peppers?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes they can do that for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd also like a two liter of pepsi to go with it just because I'm thirsty.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay sounds good do you want two for your family?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yea sure just add a mountain dew as well to that order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, certainly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I also get one of those brownies because they sound good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes it would just take longer to arrive.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: So far I just have a two liter of pepsi and mountain dew, large two topping pizza and brownies?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That sound's right.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I also add a medium pizza just plain cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes I can do that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: When will my order be ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It will take probably around 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok so I have the order for you two liter of pepsi, mountain dew peppers and pepperoni on the pizza and a medium pizza of just plain cheese along with brownies?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sound's right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It will be ready in 30-45 minutes thank you.
